alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:32PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTY IN SOUTH CENTRAL ARKANSAS AND NORTHEASTERN UNION PARISHES THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 332 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huttig, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Huttig, Marion, Felsenthal, Cecil, Haile, Linville, and Litroe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
